players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Bob, that's a very convenient claim to make when Diana is dead. How do we know you're really the detective and not the mafia trying to frame me?"
Charlie: "I believe Bob might be telling the truth. We should vote for Alice."

You: "Charlie, you're awfully quick to believe Bob without any proof. If Bob were really the detective, why would the mafia kill Diana instead of him? Think about it - the real detective would be the biggest threat."
Bob: "I think Alice's argument doesn't hold up. If I were the mafioso, why would I accuse myself? We have my word as detective—vote for Alice to end this."
